Text.Page:
Wow! We've sent you on a lot of boring crafting missions, but it's because your work is outstanding.

Rare, high quality materials are how we support the precious cause we're all fighting for, and your support to the Hands of Velika is appreciated.

Enough of me blubbering. Go talk to {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}.

I hate to keep asking you, but could you craft some items for {@LinkCreature:63#3001#Barian}? Supplies are low, and we have to keep them coming in to stay in business.

Without our merchant trade, there would be no Hands of Velika. Yeah. We're that important.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft four {@RawItem:206812} and deliver it to me as soon as you can.
You're a life-saver.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft four {@RawItem:206813} and deliver it to me as soon as you can.
You're a life-saver.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft four {@RawItem:206814} and deliver it to me as soon as you can.
You're a life-saver.

Help out again next time!

Craft four {@RawItem:206815} and deliver it to me as soon as you can.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft four {@RawItem:206816} and deliver it to me as soon as you can.
You're a life-saver.

Wow, ! Not only do you work hard and produce quality materials, you're fast!

Thanks.
